children.text: Our premium business cards are meticulously crafted to make a lasting impression. Each card is printed on high-quality stock with precision and care, ensuring your brand is represented in the best possible light.

• Premium 350gsm cardstock
• Full-color printing on both sides
• Multiple finishing options
• Professional design services available
• Fast turnaround time

template.description: Our business card template is designed to help you create a professional and impactful business card. The template includes guides for safe zones, bleed areas, and recommended text placement.
template.htmlEmbed:
Business Card Template Preview

Template includes bleed lines, safe zones, and recommended text placement guides.

faq.question: What file formats do you accept?
faq.answer: We accept PDF, AI, EPS, PSD, and high-resolution JPG files. For best results, we recommend using PDF format with embedded fonts and images.

faq.question: What's your turnaround time?
faq.answer: Standard turnaround time is 2-3 business days. Rush orders can be completed in 24 hours for an additional fee.

faq.question: Do you offer design services?
faq.answer: Yes, our professional design team can create a custom business card design for you. Design services start at $50 and include two rounds of revisions.

faq.question: What's the minimum order quantity?
faq.answer: Our minimum order is 100 cards. We offer volume discounts for orders of 500 cards or more.
